code: export var UIActionTypes={SHOW_LOADING:'GLOBAL_SHOW_LOADING',HIDE_LOADING:'GLOBAL_HIDE_LOADING',SHOW_SIDEBAR:'SHOW_SIDEBAR',HIDE_SIDEBAR:'HIDE_SIDEBAR'};var showLoading=function showLoading(){return{type:UIActionTypes.SHOW_LOADING};};var hideLoading=function hideLoading(){return{type:UIActionTypes.HIDE_LOADING};};var UIActions={showLoading:showLoading,hideLoading:hideLoading};export default UIActions;
